summary: New apparence and smaller size for the Spellbreaker shield
descriptionHtml:
NEW : Added a new file with one screenshot for the Gold and White edition.

Its my first retexture mod so your feedback is important to me !

************************************************************
Infos
************************************************************
New apparence and smaller size for the Spellbreaker shield.

I changed the scale from 1.0 to 0.9.

You can choose what you want to install beetwen the texture and the new size.

************************************************************
Installation
************************************************************
-For the texture  :

   Extract the folder \" Textures \" in Skyrim\'s \" DATA \" folder

-For the new size :

   Extract the folder \" Meshes \" in Skyrim\'s \" DATA \" folder

************************************************************
Uninstallation
************************************************************

-In  .../skyrim/data/textures/armor/

   delete the folder \" spellbreaker \"

-In .../skyrim/data/meshes/armor/

   delete the folder \" spellbreaker \"
author: Kacemus
